AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Luis, Potosi, Mexico: starting point of the undocumented aliens' journey
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where illegal aliens were being transported to, destination country of the undocumented aliens and country where unlawful aliens were being transported
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: intended destination within the United States and destination of the group
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: location where aliens could have purchased provisions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande River: border crossing point between Mexico and the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.La Moca Ranch: location where undocumented female alien was found
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas: region where guiding aliens through desert-like brush is considered reckless conduct, characterized by high temperatures and hot desert
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin for illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Diego: destination in the United States for illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ninth Circuit: court of appeals that upheld the application of a factual scenario and provided instructional case law on intent requirements for enhancements
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Cuyler: location of a referenced court case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.House Conference Report: report referencing guidelines on alien smuggling offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location of the hospital where dehydrated aliens were transported
